files.patch: @@ -735,0 +735,3 @@ + * {@systemProperty java.specification.maintenance.version} + * Java Runtime Environment specification maintenance version, + * may be interpreted as a positive integer (optional, see below) @@ -782,0 +785,10 @@ + * The {@code java.specification.maintenance.version} property is + * defined if the specification implemented by this runtime at the + * time of its construction had undergone a maintenance + * release. When defined, its value identifies that + * maintenance release. To indicate the first maintenance release + * this property will have the value {@code "1"}; to indicate the + * second maintenance release, this property will have the value + * {@code "2"}, and so on. + *

@@ -112,0 +112,4 @@
+
+        // Uncomment next props.put call after the first maintenance release for a
+        // platform specification is done and set the MR number, starting at "1".
+        // props.put("java.specification.maintenance.version", "1");
